text:
Madame Weigel's 5691; circa early 1930s; Girl's frock with bertha. With or without long sleeves. This pretty little frock is made with a full circular flounce and a bertha. It may have long sleeves, gathered into a wristband, or it may be sleeveless. A waistbelt or tie finishes the waist. Suitable materials are crepe de chine, Fuji silk, voile, etc.

Pro Spa

Mr. Van Cao, President of Pro Spa, Inc., a Garland, Texas based pedicure spa manufacturer, introduced his company's exclusive line of pipeless pedicure spas to the beauty and spa industries at Cosmoprof North America in Las Vegas. Pro Spa's pedicure spas combine the sanitation, silent operation and dependability of Sanijet Corporation's patented "pipeless" jet technology with the comfort and style offered by Berkline recliners. As an optional upgrade, Berkline's latest technology for its patented shiatsu massage system can be added to a Pro Spa pedicure spa.

Sanijet Pipeless hydrotherapy circulation systems, recipient of Popular Science magazine's "Best of What's New" award, are independently certified by NSF International for their ability to be thoroughly cleaned and disinfected, thereby eliminating the sanitation risks inherent with conventional piped and air circulation systems.

Keywords:   pedicure spas     pipeless pedicure spa chairs

thyme extract

Extract derived from the leaf or flower of the thyme plant. It can have potent antioxidant properties. Its fragrant component can also cause skin sensitivity, but thyme extract’s beneficial components can benefit skin. Generally speaking, thyme extract should not be one of the chief antioxidants in skincare products; however, in lower amounts and mixed with other antioxidants, it can be a beneficial addition.

Reference for this information:

Journal of Agricultural and Food Chemistry, March 2002, pages 1,845-1,851

How do you find the right shade of foundation?


Quick Answer

To find the right foundation, test dabs foundation on a clean face in an area on which no foundation has been applied previously. A few different shades should be applied on different spots of the cheeks or jaw lines. The shade that blends in the best is the right shade for the complexion.

Continue Reading
How do you find the right shade of foundation?
Credit: Studio 504 Stone Getty Images

Full Answer

Artificial light is unreliable, so the results of foundation tests should always be viewed in natural day light. When choosing the right shade of foundation, it is very important to remember that the shade should be as close as possible to the color of the skin. People with pale skin shouldn't use foundation with pink tones. Beige tones are best for that skin tone. If the right shade can't be found, the darker option should always be chosen, never the lighter one, because it can seem very unnatural. Foundation should not be bought without testing it on the skin.

Skin type is also very important. If the skin is dry, creamy liquid or stick foundation should be used. If the skin is oily, oil-free liquid foundation or powder foundation is the best option. If the skin is a combination of oily and dry, good options are cream to powder bases or the more powdery bases. For more mature skin, the best options are formulas that contain labels like poreless, strike free or similar.

Simplicity 6934; ©1966; MISSES' AND WOMEN'S ONE-PIECE DRESS: The A-line dress with princess seaming has set-in sleeves, back zipper and optional self fabric tie belt. V. 1 has lowered round neckline with bias roll-type collar and below elbow-length sleeves. Collarless V. 2 and 3 have short sleeves. V. 2 has lowered round neckline. Top-stitched V. 3 has high round neckline.

What is a game to play while your nail polish dries?


Quick Answer

Charades is a good game to play while waiting for nail polish to dry because it involves physical action that helps dry the nail polish faster. If there are no other people around to play charades, dancing games such as Just Dance serve the same purpose.

Continue Reading

Full Answer

Dance games are available for video game consoles such as the Nintendo Wii or the Xbox Kinect. The average waiting time between coats of nail polish is two minutes, and the average song is two to five minutes. Therefore one song between each coat is sufficient. An alternate option to is eliminate drying time by using a quick-dry topcoat.

Learn more about Nail Polish

Butterick 4690; ca. mid to late 1940s; Misses' Slim Suit Dress: Back Interest Box pleats on the jacket and two box pleats and soft pleats on the skirt create back interest for this two-piece suit dress. Button-front jacket blouse has a casual collar and cuffed sleeves in long or below-elbow lengths. Note use of contrast (B).
